document_data.name: Whirlwind Genasi
document_data.mainbody: '''Whirlwind genasi''' were those [[windsoul genasi]] who mastered their control over the element of air. They harnessed the powers of wind as powerful as those encountered during storms and hurricanes.
document_data.Culture: While the air itself was a part of a whirlwind genasi's heritage, it was also imbued into their soul.
document_data.Abilities:
When a whirlwind genasi ''[[Windwalker|walked on the wind]]'', they could actually fly. Similarly, they could form a zephyr that lifted up their allies and flew them as well, if over a short distance.

As they grew in power, these genasi could form a massive cyclone that encircled their body, throwing aside any person caught in its way.
